entry.title: What would you like to see more of?
entry.content:
I have many ideas, but I don't know what's going to be received the best.

Please comment on this post to help decide what kind of content and projects I should work on.

Toodloo!

entry.title: What would you like to see?
entry.content:
Just a short one tonight:

What would you like to see me cover here? What would you most like to see?

More tech, more personal, less personal, more science, etc?

Ta-ta!
